column4: How do I uninstall Windows applications from Wine? I installed Fireworks 8, and I want to remove it, but I can't seem to do it.
try #winehq if no one here knows
pitivi, kino
you just want to start the screensaver and lock it?
either, one.
set DISPLAY and use gnome-screensaver-command with the lock switch probably
the DiSPLAY?
export DISPLAY=whatever
if you do 'echo $DISPLAY' in an x session you'll see what it currently is for that screen
k, you need to find out what screen you want to lock, then 'export DISPLAY=whatever' when you find that out, then 'gnome-screensaver-command --whatever-the-switch-to-lock-the-screen-is'
can I PM you?
you can use #ubuntu-classroom if there is too much traffic here
do you like LaTeX?
no, what exactly does it do?
it's like html for text.  There is a a class that I believe is called "beamer" that I've seen some people use for presentations
I don't know, it looks a little complicated (google). I'm looking for a simple thing.
I agree, it would only be helpful if you already new about and liked LaTeX
there is always google presentations
Google has a presentation web application?
yes, docs.google.com
thanks!
